EditMode.Title: Edit Mode
EditMode.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the edition mode. When disabled, the authoring commands are grayed out.
EditMode.LongHelp:
Direct manipulation using drag and drop operations is also blocked.

The Edit Mode is activated by default. Each time you instantiate a new widget, the Edit Mode is also activated by default.
EditModeActivated.Title: Edition Authorized
EditModeActivated.ShortHelp: Edition is currently authorized. Click to lock the Edition.
EditModeLocked.Title: Edition Locked
EditModeLocked.ShortHelp: Edition is currently locked. Click to authorize the Edition.
EditModeLocked.LongHelp: Direct structure edition using drag and drop operations is also blocked.
Cut.Title: Cut
Cut.ShortHelp: Cuts the selected products, parts or reusable representations (shape, drawing...).
Cut.LongHelp:
Then, select another object and use the Paste command to insert the copied object under it.

You can also use drag and drop, depending on your widget preferences.

You can only make representations reusable in native apps.
Copy.Title: Copy
Copy.ShortHelp: Copies the selected products, parts or reusable representations (shape, drawing...).
Copy.LongHelp:
Then, select another object and use the Paste command to insert the copied object under it.

You can also use drag and drop, depending on your widget preferences.

You can only make representations reusable in native apps.
Paste.Title: Paste
Paste.ShortHelp: Pastes the objects that you copied or cut under the selected object.
EditInTableCmd.Title: Edit Attribute
RemoveAndResetExpand.Title: Refresh and Collapse
RemoveAndResetExpand.ShortHelp: Removes children and resets node to be expanded.
